item.description:
Scissors, glue, magazine images - what a fun way to take this mid-week break for yourself. Come tap into your imagination & intuition & learn about yourself through the process called SoulCollage®.

Wondering what SoulCollage® is? Are you an artist looking for some inspiration & a new medium? Are you looking to meet wonderful like minded souls? Have you been meaning to put a card together but haven't found the time? Are you always on the lookout for new images? If you answered yes to any of these questions, you will love this meetup.

No experience necessary. This is open to all levels, whether you have 200 cards or none - you are welcome.

I've recently acquired magazines from the 1970s & 1980s, the images in there are a blast!

Led by an experienced SoulCollage® Facilitator.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have an open heart & a big smile on my face :)

group.name: Above and Beyond Boston SoulCollage Meetup

item.name: Soul Collage Monthly Meetup
